sentences.sContent: Add some raisins to the dough.
sentences.sCn: 在生面团中加一些葡萄干。

sentences.sContent: A baker is kneading a dough.
sentences.sCn: 一位面包师正在揉面团。

sentences.sContent: She patted the dough into a flat cake.
sentences.sContent_eng: She patted the dough into a flat cake.
sentences.sCn: 她把面团轻轻拍成扁饼。

words.tran: 面团似的；柔软的；苍白的；半熟的

trans.tranOther: a mixture of flour and water ready to be baked into bread,  pastry  etc
